<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King a proclamation for reuoking the commission concerning archery. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie, And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill, Imprinted at London : M.DC.XXXI [1631]
Arms with rose and thistle at top. " Giuen at Our Court at Woodstocke, the xxiij. of August, in the seuenth yeere of Our Reigne." Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Arms with rose and thistle at top. " Giuen at Our Court at Woodstocke, the xxiij. of August, in the seuenth yeere of Our Reigne." Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
